docs.title: Interests
docs.text:
I am especially interested in Embedded Firmware, BSP (Linux, RTOS), and DSP systems, with a strong focus on system-level integration and debugging.

I tend to focus on solving integration-level problems between hardware, firmware, and software, where timing, reliability, and cross-domain interactions are critical.
